top_comments.comment: Thank you so much for listing the recipe in grams. Will be baking these tomorrow. Just bought 25lbs of pecans from the farm today.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Such a simple an delicious recipe! It's my hubs B-day this Sunday, so I will attempt to make these! Ty John. I was scrolling your videos, to see any new and simple recipes to make! Win Win! :)
